org.framework.algorithm.cleverReconfiguration

Class CleverReconfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.framework.algorithm.cleverReconfiguration.CleverReconfiguration

  • public class CleverReconfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Algorithm 3: Recalculation-based VMPr Recovering

    Recovering method based on partially recalculating the placement reconfiguration calculated by the VMPr, according to the changes that happened during the placement calculation, applying basic operations to update the potentially obsolete placement.

    Since:
    12/26/16

        Clever Reconfiguration VMP
        Parameters:
        workload - Workload Trace
        physicalMachines - List of Physical Machines
        virtualMachines - List of Virtual Machines
        derivedVMs - List of Derived Virtual Machines
        revenueByTime - Revenue by time
        wastedResources - WastedResources by time
        wastedResourcesRatioByTime - WastedResourcesRatio per time
        powerByTime - Power Consumption by time
        placements - List of Placement by time
        code - Heuristics Algorithm Code
        timeUnit - Time init
        requestsProcess - Type of Process
        maxPower - Maximum Power Consumption
        scenarioFile - Name of Scenario RequestsProcess:
        • Requests[0]: requestServed Number of requests served
        • Requests[1]: requestRejected Number of requests rejected
        • Requests[2]: requestUpdated Number of requests updated
        • Requests[3]: violation Number of violation
